DOC.brief_summary: Several sugar-replacement sweetener currently market , include saccharine ( ex . Sweet ' N Low ) , aspartame ( ex . Equal ) , sucralose ( ex . Splenda ) . The purpose study examine wether non caloric sweetener affect well body work control blood sugar . The study include detailed blood sugar test drink liquid may contain sucralose . The investigator hypothesize drink liquid sucralose effect amount specific appetite-affecting substance naturally produce body .
